title: Kyou Kara Ore wa Loli no Himo! - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manga   Loli   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Writers
author: Akatsuki Yuki   暁 雪
description: I, Tendou Haru, who was somehow aiming for becoming a mangaka, became a winner in life. Super rich bishoujo elementary school student, Nijou Touka was a big fan of mine, on top of that, she said that she is going to be my patron. Just like that, my ideal living off someone lifestyle had started.>
